entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
